body.p: Where are the muscles in relation to the bones and skin?

response.feedback: Correct. Muscles are between the bones and skin.
Incorrect. The muscles are superficial to the bones, but deep compared to the skin.
Incorrect. The muscles are deep compared to the skin, but superficial to the bones.
Incorrect. Muscle, bones and skin are all over the body.

part.hint: Muscles cover the bones and skin covers the muscles; therefore, muscles are between the skin and bones.
